translations.uz:
Xurmatni himoya qilish konstitutsiyaviy burchdir

Poytaxtda havo ifloslanishi biz atrofimizdagi ekologiyaga befarq qolmasligimizni eslatdi; Tabiatni saqlash va himoya qilish kerak.

Barcha kanallarimiz
translations.en:
Protecting nature is a constitutional duty

Air pollution in the capital reminded us that we cannot remain indifferent to the ecology around us; it is necessary to preserve and protect nature.
